Deprecated API

Contents
  • Deprecated Methods
Deprecated Methods
org.araneaframework.uilib.form.BeanFormWidget.addBeanSubForm(String, Class)
          Use BeanFormWidget.addSimpleBeanSubForm(String, Class) instead. 
org.araneaframework.uilib.form.formlist.FormListUtil.addDeleteButtonToRowForm(String, BaseFormListWidget, FormWidget, K)
          Use FormListUtil.addDeleteButtonToRowForm(String, FormRow) instead. 
org.araneaframework.uilib.form.formlist.FormListUtil.addEditSaveButtonToRowForm(String, BaseFormListWidget, FormWidget, K)
          Use FormListUtil.addEditSaveButtonToRowForm(String, FormRow) instead. 
org.araneaframework.uilib.form.formlist.FormListUtil.addOpenCloseButtonToRowForm(String, BaseFormListWidget, FormWidget, K)
          Use FormListUtil.addOpenCloseButtonToRowForm(String, FormRow) instead. 
org.araneaframework.uilib.form.formlist.FormListUtil.addSaveButtonToRowForm(String, BaseFormListWidget, FormWidget, K)
          Use FormListUtil.addSaveButtonToRowForm(String, FormRow) instead. 
org.araneaframework.uilib.form.control.BaseSelectControl.getValueIndex(String)
           
org.araneaframework.uilib.util.DisplayItemContainer.getValueIndex(String)
          Just don't use it. The index is meaningless. 
org.araneaframework.uilib.core.MenuItem.isHolder()
            
org.araneaframework.uilib.util.DisplayItemUtil.isValueInItems(Collection, String)
          Since 2.0: use DisplayItemUtil.containsItem(Collection, String) instead. 
org.araneaframework.uilib.util.DisplayItemUtil.isValueInItems(DisplayItemContainer, String)
          Since 2.0: use DisplayItemUtil.containsItem(DisplayItemContainer, String) instead. 
org.araneaframework.http.filter.StandardRedirectingFilterWidget.ResponseWrapper.setStatus(int, String)
          To set a status code use StandardRedirectingFilterWidget.ResponseWrapper.setStatus(int), to send an error with a description use StandardRedirectingFilterWidget.ResponseWrapper.sendError(int, String) . Sets the status code and message for this response. 
org.araneaframework.jsp.tag.uilib.form.FormSimpleLabelHtmlTag.writeLabel(Writer, String, boolean, String, String, PageContext, boolean, String)
          Use FormSimpleLabelHtmlTag.writeLabel(Writer,String,boolean,String,String,PageContext,boolean,String,String) instead
